## Reading

## Tutorials

- Before completing the next tutorial, reinstall the `qsslearnr` package to have the latest version by running these lines of code:

```{r eval = FALSE}
remove.packages("qsslearnr")
remotes::install_github("mattblackwell/qsslearnr")
```

- Complete "QSS Tutorial 3: Measurement I" and upload the PDF report you produce at the end of the tutorial to Gradescope (see link at the top of this page) by Monday, September 21st 11:59pm ET. 
- If you have any issues opening the tutorial, please see the instructions on [how to install the tutorials](/assignments/tutorials/).
